messages.subject: Clearing Majordomo Problem
messages.msgSnippet: We re still not sure what happened to create the majordomo mess yesterday, but I m deleted 100+ blank messages from the archives. Just so you know in case
messages.messageBody:
We're still not sure what happened to create the majordomo
mess yesterday, but I'm deleted 100+ blank messages from the
archives. Just so you know in case someone wonders about the
lapse in numerical order back there.

Our sincerest apologies for the barrage of messages. Mr.
Majordomo has been banned from this list (thanks, Joyce!), and
hopefully that won't ever happen again.

Just wish we knew *what* happened, as nobody seems to have
a clue.

Helen
